subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Surely no American team has been this familiar with the German style of play as five players on the 23-man United States men’s national team have dual American-German citizenship.
snippet: Surely no American team has been this familiar with the German style of play as five players on the 23-man United States men’s national team have dual American-German citizenship.
